A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a good movie! Every film has it's flaws\, and this one did as well\, but it was definitely enjoyable and most of the people mad about it just seem to be upset that their theories weren't true. This had incredible scenes and beautifully cinematic moments that shouldn't be overlooked by angry fanboys. If anything\, this film got me more excited for Episode 9.
